item.title: 瑞士信贷在欧盟外汇交易调查中被削减罚款
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）在与欧盟监管机构就瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse Group AG）参与外汇交易价格操纵卡特尔一案进行的诉讼中败诉，但在法官将罚金削减近三分之二后，败诉也变得更有甜头。【原文：UBS Group AG lost the crux of its case against European Union regulators over Credit Suisse Group AG’s involvement in a foreign-exchange price fixing cartel — but defeat was sweetened after judges slashed the fine by nearly two-thirds.】

item.title: 荷兰在国家帮助下有望实现天然气储存目标
item.description: 荷兰政府相信该国将在今年冬天之前确保足够的天然气库存，并计划从 2026 年开始建立 "应急储备"，以缓解交易商对储气库注入缓慢的担忧。【原文：The Dutch government is confident the country will secure enough natural gas inventories ahead of this winter and plans to establish an “emergency reserve” starting in 2026 — seeking to ease trader concerns over sluggish storage injections.】

item.title: S.非洲通胀率在议息会议前创四个月新高
item.description: 由于牛肉和蔬菜价格飙升，6 月份南非通胀率升至四个月来的最高点。【原文：South African inflation quickened to a four-month high in June, as prices of beef and vegetables spiked.】

item.title: 卡塔尔确认申办 2036 年奥运会，这在中东地区尚属首次
item.description: 卡塔尔确认将申办 2036 年夏季奥运会，力争成为第一个主办世界最大体育赛事之一的中东国家。【原文：Qatar confirmed it will bid for the 2036 Summer Olympics, trying to become the first Middle Eastern nation to host one of the world’s biggest sporting events.】

item.title: 据说塔塔资本将寻求更高的 IPO 估值目标
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，塔塔资本有限公司正在为其计划中的首次公开募股寻求 180 亿至 200 亿美元的估值，并可能最快于本周提交最新的红鲱鱼招股说明书草案。【原文：Tata Capital Ltd. is seeking a valuation of $18 billion to $20 billion in its planned initial public offering and could file an updated draft red herring prospectus as soon as this week, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 瑞士银行 EFG 警告美元走软，净利润跃升 36
item.description: EFG International AG 表示，今年上半年，美元疲软使其资产价值减少了 117 亿瑞士法郎（约合 148 亿美元），而这家瑞士银行的净利润增长了 36%。【原文：EFG International AG said a weakening dollar mostly eroded the value of its assets by 11.7 billion Swiss francs ($14.8 billion) in the first half of the year as the Swiss bank reported a 36% gain in net profit.】

item.title: 南非股指突破 100,000 点心理关口
item.description: 南非基准股指首次突破 100,000 点心理关口，因为人们乐观地认为，关键的预算投票将得到执政联盟中主要政党的支持。【原文：South Africa’s benchmark stock index crossed the psychological level of 100,000 for the first time on optimism that a crucial budget vote will get support from key parties in the governing coalition.】

item.title: 奢侈品的赢家与输家之间的鸿沟只会越来越大
item.description: 对于欧洲的奢侈品股票来说，这个财报季将使赢家和输家之间不断扩大的差距变得更加明显。【原文：For Europe’s luxury stocks, this earnings season will hammer home the widening gulf between the winners and the losers.】

item.title: 台湾希望在新一轮会谈中与美国达成协议
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，台湾贸易谈判代表已抵达美国进行关税谈判，以期与唐纳德-特朗普总统的团队达成一项协议。【原文：Taiwan’s trade negotiators have arrived in the US for tariff talks to clinch a deal with President Donald Trump’s team, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 流动性减少，印度隔夜拆借成本超过关键利率
item.description: 受每月税收外流的影响，印度的隔夜利率已升至央行关键政策利率之上，这可能导致央行下一次吸收流动性拍卖的参与度减弱。【原文：India’s overnight rates have risen above the central bank’s key policy rate, driven by monthly tax outflows, which could result in weakened participation at the central bank’s next liquidity absorption auction.】

item.title: 如果日本总统石破茂辞职，谁将接替他的位置？
item.description: 陷入困境的日本首相石破茂在周日的上议院选举中遭遇历史性失败，人们猜测他的日子已经屈指可数。【原文：Embattled Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba is facing speculation that his days are numbered after facing a historic defeat in the upper house election on Sunday.】

item.title: 诺基亚股价因 "贸易门 "下跌，外汇和关税促使公司下调业绩展望
item.description: 诺基亚公司（Nokia Oyj）股价在常规交易开始前下跌，原因是这家芬兰 5G 设备制造商以美元走软和关税为由下调了利润指导。【原文：Nokia Oyj shares fell before the start of regular trading after the Finnish maker of 5G gear cut its profit guidance, citing a weaker US dollar and tariffs.】

item.title: 伊比利亚电力公司开始增资 50 亿欧元，以加强电力网络建设
item.description: 伊比利亚-德罗拉公司开始增资 50 亿欧元，旨在推动其在全球投资电力网络的战略。【原文：Iberdrola started a €5 billion capital increase aimed at boosting its strategy of investing in power networks globally.】

item.title: Canal+ 30 亿美元非洲交易获得反垄断批准
item.description: Canal+ 收购 MultiChoice Group Ltd. 的交易获得了南非反垄断法的批准，这将为其成为非洲大陆最大的付费电视和流媒体企业扫清障碍。【原文：Canal+ received South African anti-trust approval to buy MultiChoice Group Ltd., which will clear the way to make it the largest pay-TV and streaming business on the continent.】

item.title: 投资者为何担心日本债券市场
item.description: 日本 7.6 万亿美元债券市场几个月来一反常态的波动，让习惯了平淡无奇的交易的投资者们着实吓了一跳。【原文：Months of uncharacteristic volatility in Japan’s $7.6 trillion bond market has investors — who have become accustomed to uneventful trading — well and truly spooked.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：贸易前景乐观，英国股市将再创新高
美国贸易紧张局势缓和，中国多头债券加入全球下跌行列
item.description: 随着美国贸易紧张局势的缓解和中国政府应对通货紧缩的努力抑制了对中国债券的需求，全球较长期限债券的大跌终于波及到了中国债券。【原文：A global selloff in longer-dated bonds has finally spilled over into Chinese debt, as easing US trade tensions and Beijing’s efforts to tackle deflation damp demand for the notes.】

item.title: 液化天然气设施中断后，Equinor 季度利润下降
item.description: Equinor ASA 公司第二季度利润下降，原因是油价疲软以及挪威北部液化天然气设施长期停运。【原文：Equinor ASA’s second-quarter profit fell on softer oil prices and a prolonged outage at its liquefied natural gas facility in northern Norway.】

item.title: 新加坡核心通胀率上升速度与上月持平
item.description: 在备受关注的货币政策审查之前，新加坡 6 月份的主要通胀指标年率与上月持平。【原文：Singapore’s key inflation gauge rose at the same annual rate in June from last month, ahead of a closely-watched monetary policy review.】

item.title: 高盛认为特朗普的基准关税税率将升至 15
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Economists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc. expect the US baseline “reciprocal” tariff rate will rise from 10% to 15%, with a 50% levy on copper and critical minerals — an outcome that threatens to fuel inflation and weigh on economic growth.】

item.title: Glencore 将关闭澳大利亚铜矿，冶炼厂岌岌可危
item.description: Glencore Plc 正按计划于下周关闭其在昆士兰州伊萨山的最后两个铜矿，然后再决定是否同时关闭位于同一矿区的冶炼厂。【原文：Glencore Plc is on track to close its last two copper mines in Mt Isa, Queensland, next week, ahead of a decision on whether to also shutter a smelter at the same complex.】

item.title: 日本 40 年期债券拍卖会出现 2011 年以来最弱的需求率
item.description: 由于对政府支出的担忧以及美国和日本达成贸易协议，日本 40 年期国债拍卖出现了 2011 年以来最弱的需求。【原文：Japan’s 40-year government bond auction saw its weakest demand since 2011 amid concerns over government spending and after the US and Japan reached a trade deal.】

item.title: 星巴克在中国开设免费学习室吸引回头客
item.description: 星巴克公司在中国的一些门店推出了免费的 "自习室"，这是该公司在其第二大市场国内竞争日益激烈的情况下，为提高消费者流量而采取的最新举措。【原文：Starbucks Corp. has launched free “study rooms” in some of its China outlets, the company’s latest initiative to help boost consumer traffic as domestic competition surges in its second-biggest market.】

item.title: 香港中资股有望创 2021 年以来最高收盘价
item.description: 受中美贸易紧张局势缓和以及权重科技股上涨的提振，在香港交易的中国股市的一个重要指标有望创下 2021 年 11 月以来的最高收盘价。【原文：A key gauge of Chinese stocks traded in Hong Kong was on course for its highest close since November 2021, boosted by easing Sino-American trade tensions and gains in heavyweight tech shares.】

item.title: PayPal 将与 Tenpay 和 UPI 共同创建全球数字钱包平台
item.description: 贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. is launching a platform that will enable customers with domestic digital wallets to easily transact with businesses globally, as the payments giant seeks to capture a bigger chunk of the international market.】

item.title: 印度机场公司 GMR 计划出售 5.79 亿卢比债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，GMR 机场有限公司正在考虑出售 500 亿卢比（5.79 亿美元）的本币债券，这可能创下印度第二大私营机场运营商以卢比发行债券的纪录。【原文：GMR Airports Ltd. is considering a 50 billion rupees ($579 million) local-currency bond sale, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could be a record rupee issuance for India’s second-largest private airport operator.】

item.title: 特朗普协议为世界制造业基地带来一丝清朗
item.description: 在经历了数月的不确定性之后，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普最新达成的关税协议正在为全球最大的制造业地区澄清新贸易格局的大致轮廓。【原文：After months of uncertainty, President Donald Trump’s latest tariff deals are providing clarity on the broad contours of a new trade landscape for the world’s biggest manufacturing region.】

item.title: 马来西亚安瓦尔推出帮助解决生活费用上涨问题的计划
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，马来西亚将降低该国最受欢迎的汽油价格，并发放现金以帮助人们应对生活成本。【原文：Malaysia will lower prices of the country’s most popular petrol for its citizens, and also give cash handouts to help people deal with the cost of living, Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会调查与前列腺癌药物管线相关的信息披露，Telix 股票下跌
item.description: 澳大利亚放射性药物开发商泰利克斯制药有限公司（Telix Pharmaceuticals Ltd.）称收到了美国证券交易委员会的传票，要求披露其前列腺癌候选疗法的相关信息，该公司股价暴跌达 16%，创下 21 个月以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Telix Pharmaceuticals Ltd. slumped as much as 16%, the most in 21 months, after the Australian developer of radioactive drugs said it received a subpoena from the US Securities and Exchange Commission seeking information about disclosures related to its prostate cancer therapeutic candidates.】
